mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WINNING_NUM (DRAW_NUM, WINNING_NUM1, WINNING_NUM2, WINNING_NUM3, WINNING_NUM4, WINNING_NUM5, WINNING_NUM6, BONUS_NUM, FIRST_PRIZE_AMOUNT, CRT_DT) VALUES (#{drwNo}, #{drwtNo1}, #{drwtNo2}, #{drwtNo3}, #{drwtNo4}, #{drwtNo5}, #{drwtNo6}, #{bnusNo}, #{firstWinamnt}, #{drwNoDate})
mapper.select: SELECT winning_num1 AS number, count(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT winning_num1 FROM (SELECT * FROM WINNING_NUM WHERE crt_dt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}) AS wn1 UNION ALL SELECT winning_num2 FROM (SELECT * FROM WINNING_NUM WHERE crt_dt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}) AS wn2 UNION ALL SELECT winning_num3 FROM (SELECT * FROM WINNING_NUM WHERE crt_dt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}) AS wn3 UNION ALL SELECT winning_num4 FROM (SELECT * FROM WINNING_NUM WHERE crt_dt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}) AS wn4 UNION ALL SELECT winning_num5 FROM (SELECT * FROM WINNING_NUM WHERE crt_dt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}) AS wn5 UNION ALL SELECT winning_num6 FROM (SELECT * FROM WINNING_NUM WHERE crt_dt BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}) AS wn6 )AS combined_nums GROUP BY winning_num1 ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 6;
